path.title: Virtual Environment Path
path.description: Path to the Python virtual environment to use.

random-suffix.title: Create Random Suffix
random-suffix.description: Whether to create a random suffix for the virtual environment directory to avoid conflicts.

force-install.title: Force Install
force-install.description: Whether to force the installation of the dependencies, even if the venv already exists.

keep-venv.title: Keep Virtual Environment
keep-venv.description: Whether to keep the virtual environment after the workflow execution.

requirements.title: Requirements
requirements.description: Path to the requirements.txt file for the virtual environment.
